tool_description: Access daily fantasy and betting NBA player props ,(bet odds) and insights effortlessly with the NBA FlexProps Stats API. Tailor queries using a simple search end for key stats like Points, Rebounds, Assists, Blocks+Steals, and PRA to elevate your understanding of player contributions in NBA events , odds and basketball bets.
name: flexprops
title: flexprops

api_list.name: Search Stats and Props
api_list.description:
Endpoint : Search Player Statistics
Endpoint: /search

STAT NAMES:
Below are the names of stats that can be retrieved. Under the stat parameter, use the names in parentheses as follows:

Points **(PTS)**
Rebounds **(REBS)**
Offensive Rebounds **(ORB)**
Defensive Rebounds **(DRB)**
Assists **(AST)**
Blocks **(BLK)**
Steals **(STL)**
Points + Rebounds **(PR)**
Points + Assists **(PA)**
Rebounds + Assists **(RA)**
Points + Rebounds + Assists **(PRA)**
Blocks + Steals **(BS)**
Turnovers **(TOV)**
Field Goals Made **(FGM)**
Field Goals Attempted **(FGA)**
Free Throws Made **(FTM)**
Free Throws Attempted **(FTA)**
3-Point Made **(ThreePM)**
3-Point Attempted **(ThreePA)**
Minutes Played **(MIN)**
